name: Grandma's House: College Days
description: Dive into Grandma's House: College Days, a cheeky adult kinetic novel offering a light-hearted romp through college life, evoking chuckles more than challenges. As the main character, stumble through a series of amusing, mildly risqué escapades amidst a backdrop of casual college camaraderie. With a sprinkle of humor and a dash of romance, this game serves as a whimsical prelude to the Grandma's House saga, setting a playful stage for the escapades that follow. It's a small slice of light-hearted fun, nothing more, nothing less—perfect for a casual, comedic diversion from the daily grind.
